definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

sentences.english: Any other text should be short and easy to digest.
sentences.chinese: 任何文字都應該簡短並容易消化。

sentences.english: In addition, the water Masataka Fukushima and media will also be a brief meeting.
sentences.chinese: 此外，清水正孝還會在福島與媒體做一個簡短見面。

sentences.english: Also Adama placed a short comment on that topic later.
sentences.chinese: 此外阿達瑪主題後面放置了一個簡短的評論是。

sentences.english: Don’t just stand there nodding and answer with short sentences.
sentences.chinese: 不要只是在那裏點頭或者問簡短的問題。

sentences.english: Good morning, dear judges! I'm very glad to stand here and give my short speach to you.
sentences.chinese: 我很高興地站在這裏，給我簡短的發言給你。

sentences.english: Hiddink's plans should be clarified shortly.
sentences.chinese: 希丁克的計劃應該被簡短的闡明。

sentences.english: The play was a dramatization of a short story.
sentences.chinese: 那個劇本是對一個簡短事故的戲劇化。

sentences.english: Li Jianxi says in the brief statement to countrywide TV living broadcast.
sentences.chinese: 李健熙在向全國電視直播的簡短聲明中說。

sentences.english: With brief eye contact and slight smile, I felt incomparably happy right at that moment.
sentences.chinese: 簡短的對視和輕輕微笑，一霎那，我幸福無比。

sentences.english: OK, This will be briefer than my previous attempt.
sentences.chinese: 好的，這比我預期中的要簡短。

sentences.english: A brief for the common person about the types of malocclusion, causes and treatment options.
sentences.chinese: 簡短的共同人的類型的錯，原因和治療方法。

sentences.english: He prevailed on the lieutenant to send in a short note.
sentences.chinese: 他說動那個副官，遞上了一張簡短的便條進去。

sentences.english: Life is a short journey from birth to death.
sentences.chinese: 從生到死，生命是個簡短的旅程。

sentences.english: A smile note or quick phone call could be just what they need .
sentences.chinese: 簡短的留言或寥寥數語的電話可能正是他們所需要的。

definition: to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
